name: Weed Life 4Ever (Browser Version)
description:
If you're skeptical about this game... have a look at the trailer/pics on the only devlog of this game.

(Also the screen will be green for a while... that's normal! That means the game is just loading)

Disclaimer: This game is for meme purposes only! Don't do drugs, it's actually horrendous for you... and on that note, proceed with caution:

Alright guys!! In today's episode of randical randy's epic games, your're gonna be dealing with tha gud weed 😎😎😎😎

Some very cool instructions before you continue to ur journey to weedness grateness:

- Get ur weed frum local vendors with different prises

- Avoyd the polese

- Pay ur tackses by Sunday (or the 7th day)

- Sleeping in your camper van makes time pass quicker

- Run this business as long as you can!!!!

GOOD LUCK!!!! DONT DIE

Control Instructions:

- Arrow Keys to move

- Press Space on a red/green rectangle to interact with buildings/cars

- Press Space to go through dialogue

- Arrow keys to go through dialogue options

- Enter/Return to choose the dialogue option
